Map.name: Testmap
Map.variable:
Hi! Welcome to this game. This is version 0.6 of the map.
When it's ready, you will go for a trasure hidden in this country. You'll have to find objects and use them and do everything you have to do in the most classic of adventure games.
Presently supported Commands are: quit (Q) inventory (I) go north/east/south/west (N/E/S/W) look [at <object>] -- Look at location [or object] take <object> drop <object> open <object> [with <object>] use <object> [on/with <object>] say <words> give <object> to <person>
Map.message: You cannot go in that direction!
This is what you carry with you:
Sorry, I didn't quite understand you...
I don't know what that is...
What shall I use it on?
What would you like to say?
There's nobody to talk to. And remember: talking to oneself is the first sign of madness...
Who do you want to give it to?
What do you want to open?
What do you want to open the door with?

room.info:
As you go deeper into the forest, it gets darker and closer... Suddenly, you realize that the way back has been closed by giand spider webs.. You see the beasts getting closer...
and closer.......
and they eat you. Well, you're dead...
You go deeper into the forest. It's quite dark and stifling, and you see some spider webs along the narrowing path...

You stand on a small path at the edge of a forest.
Beside you, there's an old man. He points to the path that leads into the forest in eastern direction and says:
"Well, young man, there it is - the forest of Sir Arthur Pewty. There's a huge trasure hidden in there, and only the bravest can aspire to find it. I want you to go into the forest, find the treasure and bring it here. Are you up to the task?"...
He grins maliciously...

command.helper: You stand on a small path at the edge of a forest. The old man says: "Well, sonny, what about the treasure? Didn't I tell you not to come back until you have it? Hurry up, my dinner's getting cold!"

person.name: an old man
person.look_text: He looks at you with bright blue eyes.

event.name: old_man_01
event.message: Here, have these herbs. I hope you have an adequate pipe yourself!

event.name: old_man_02
event.message: Well, I hope you don't expect me to give you some of my precious herbs without something in exchange...

event.name: old_man_03
event.message: Hi There!

event.name: old_man_04
event.message: Well, I'm the local herb merchant here. I've often wandered through this forest looking for herbs and toadstools, and one day I heard people talking about a treasure hidden deep in a cave guarded by a giant. Well, I'm not brave or strong, but you are. So I want YOU to go into the forest and find the trasure. In exchange, you might get some of my herbs...

event.name: old_man_05
event.message: Well, well, well, so you need my help already? Look, you'll just have to go into the forest and find the treasure, it's simple as that. Still, you should be prepared to meet some dangerous creatures, and also to solve some riddles. For example: you shouldn't leave me without having received something from me...

room.info: You are inside the Western Fortress. Everybody has gone out, so it's cold and dark in here. You can just see the shining iron of an axe above the chimney.
room.look_text: As you wander around the place and take closer look, you find a beautiful little amulet lying under a chair. It carries Sir Arthur Pewty's coat of arms

room.info: You enter the courtyard. Everything is quiet. In the northern fa√ßade, there is a huge wooden entrance door.
The path stretches out east and westward. In northern direction, there's a gate with a sign that reads: "Sir Arthur Pewty's Western Fortress. No Trespassing!"
You are wandering through the deep, dark forest. You can hardly see anything.
You are wandering through the deep, dark forest. You can hardly see anything.
You are just inside the forest. There's an old woman who's weeping and murmuring: "Oh dear, oh dear! Oh dear, oh dear!"...

command.helper: You are just inside the forest. The old woman still murmurs about her lost key...

person.name: an old woman
person.look_text: She cries and cries. Maybe she needs some help?

event.name: old_woman_01
event.message: Oh dear me, I'll be in so much trouble...

event.name: old_woman_02
event.message: Oh, if you would really like to help me... Listen: The Western Fortress is abandoned, all the soldiers were called to the king's palace. They told me to clean the place before they get back, but I've lost the key! Please help me! The key must be somewhere close to the village. If you find it, will you bring it to me?

event.name: old_woman_03
event.message: Oh, my dear young man, you are so brave! I am so proud of you that you found the key and brought it to me! Here, take this pipe as a small reward. Thank heavens no-one entered the fortress and stole the amulet!

room.info: You reach a fork. There's an old derelict sign on the ground which says: "To the Village", but you don't know where it originally pointed to.
You enter a small village. It is quite deserted, but at the village well, you see a girl who looks at you curiously.

person.name: a beautiful young girl
person.look_text: She looks very nice. Perhaps you should talk to her instead of staring at her...

event.name: village_girl_01
event.message: Hi stranger! Can I help you?

event.name: village_girl_02
event.message: Of course I will help you. What's the problem?

event.name: village_girl_03
event.message: Well, there's an old fortress across the river and to the west. It's been looking quite empty lately, though there never used to be many soldiers around. What do you want there?

room.info: You come to a bridge crossing a small noisy river. On the north side, the path continues to a village. On the other side, the path forks and continues east and west.
You are wandering through the deep, dark forest. You can hardly see anything.
You are wandering through the deep, dark forest. You can hardly see anything.
There's a troll here in the forest. You'll have to fight him to be able to pass.
You are on a narrow path through the forest. A lot of foliage covers the ground, moved by a cold wind.
room.look_text: As you take a closer look and move some of the foliage, you see that there's a rusty old key lying beside a tree under the dead leaves...

room.info: You reach a fork. The path continues in three directions.
The way stretches out east and westwards. In the south, you can see a long wall with a warden.

person.name: The forest wall warden
person.look_text: This warden doesn't move a bit and won't react to anything you might possibly do.

event.name: forest_warden_01
event.message: You cannot pass. Only the ones approved by the seer Humungus the Great may pass this gate. You cannot pass.

event.name: forest_warden_02

command.helper: In the northern part of the village, there's the hut of the seer you heard about.

event.message: You can find Humungus the great in the next village to the east from here.

room.info: You are wandering through the deep, dark forest. You can hardly see anything.
You are wandering through the deep, dark forest. You can hardly see anything.
You are inside a dark cave. There are bats that suck your blood, so you still need enough health...
You found the treasure!!! Congratulations!
The path bends from west to south. As you walk along the bend, you come across a young farmer.

person.name: a young farmer
person.look_text: He's a rosy-cheekey young farmer, with quite some muscles and a tight shirt.

event.name: farmer_01
event.message: Hi there, stranger! How are you doing?

event.name: farmer_02
event.message: You need some help? Well, you might want to tell me more about your quest then...

event.name: farmer_03
event.message: You want to go inside the forest? Are you mad? There are dangerous creatures inside there! Well, anyway, if you want to enter, you'll have to convince the guard who blocks the entrance to the forest. That won't be easy, though...

room.info: You walk trough wide grain fields.
You are inside an old house.

Ok, you've entered the wrong place. There's a giant here who kills you instantly.
You're dead. You lose...
You are in a village. Villagers advise you not to go to the old house north of here, since it's bewitched. Of course, you don't believe a word of it.
You are on a path that spreads out before you in three directions.
You are inside the hut of the seer. It's quite dark in here, and there's a strange smell in the air.

person.name: Humungus the Great
person.look_text: He's very old, his eyes are closed most of the time. His white hair flows around his shoulders.

event.name: seer_01
event.message: Hello stranger. I have not yet seen you before, but your paths are well-known to my inner eye. In what way can I help you?

event.name: seer_02
event.message: Well, I'm not sure if I should give you this piece of information. The king would not like it. If only you had some token to identify you as a loyal kingsman

event.name: seer_03

command.helper: There's an old, sinister looking lady standing in a far-off corner.

event.message: All right, I see you are brave-hearted. This is what I can do for you: I will tell old Miss Mary-Ann to wait for you. She will be in the dark village in the far north. Tell her Vladimir sent you.

room.info: You are in a little village.
You are on a path that spreads out before you in three directions.
You walk along a narrow country road.
You walk through wide oats fields.
You walk through wide oats fields.
You walk are in a small village. The villagers are not very friendly and hurt you. You lose health.
You reach a crossroads. Four paths lead in four directions.

item.name: Key to the Western Fortress
item.look_text: You see an old fashioned and quite heavy iron key.

item.name: A small sword
item.look_text: This slightly rusty and about 4ft long sword was your grandfather's pride in the battle of Hastings... or something like that.....

item.name: Some candy
item.look_text: There's nothing like some sweet candy! It will make your dentist laugh on his yacht!

item.name: A silver amulet
item.look_text: This shiny silver amulet bears some marks that seem letters, but you cannot read them.

item.name: A shining axe
item.look_text: This axe is really sharp, be careful!

item.name: A small pipe
item.look_text: This pipe seems ideal for smoking some kind of herbal matter

item.name: a letter for the warden
item.look_text: This piece of paper contains some information. Pity you cannot read...

person.name: an old spinster lady
person.look_text: This woman looks older than the Stonhenge stones...

event.name: spinster_01
event.message: Here, give this letter to the warden. He will let you pass into the deep forest. But beware...
